member.name: T:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization
member.summary: This class is responsible to provide some methods to convert a normal URL to RFC2396 valid URL.

member.summary: Public constrcutor

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.GetCanonicalizedUrl(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a url in general form and returns a canonicalized URL.
member.returns: RFC2396 valid URL.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.GetHostName(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the hostname of the URL.
member.returns: Hostname.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.GetRemainder(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the remainder of the URL.
member.returns: Remainder.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.RemoveSpecialCharacters(System.String)
member.summary: Removes special characters from the hostname.
member.returns: Escaped hostname.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.ReplaceConsecutiveDots(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces consecutive dots with a single dot.
member.returns: Escaped hostname.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.NormalizeIPAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Normalizes the hostname if it is an IP address.
member.returns: Normalized hostname.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.EscapeSpecialChars(System.String)
member.summary: Escapes special characters from URL.
member.returns: Hostname with escaped URL.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.ResolveSequences(System.String)
member.summary: Resolves sequences of dots.
member.returns: Remainder without sequences of dots.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Canonicalization.RemoveFragmentIdentifier(System.String)
member.summary: Removes fragment identifier (#) and everything after it.
member.returns: The remainder of the URL after removing fragment identifier.

member.summary: User agent of the requester. (Required)

member.name: P:Subkismet.IComment.CommentType
member.summary: May be one of the following: {blank}, "comment", "trackback", "pingback", or a made-up value like "registration".

member.name: P:Subkismet.IComment.ServerEnvironmentVariables

member.name: T:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase
member.summary:
TrackbackBase is an abstract base class to handle trackback requests.
Inherit from this class to filter out spammers trying to add comments to a blog post through trackback requests.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.ProcessRequest(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Enables processing of HTTP Web requests by a custom HttpHandler that implements the interface.
member.param: An object that provides references to the intrinsic server objects (for example, Request, Response, Session, and Server) used to service HTTP requests.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.ProcessTrackback(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Processes the trackback if the request isn't invalid. It determines whether or not the request is spam or not.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.SendResponse(System.Web.HttpContext)
member.summary: Sends a resonse to the requesting client, based on the validity of the request. If it is spam, then a HTTP status code 404 will be sent.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.IsTrackbackValid
member.summary: Returns whether or not the request is valid.
member.returns: True if the request is valid; otherwise false.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.ExamineRequest(System.String)
member.summary: Analyses the request and if ExamineSendersUrl is True, then it also examines the senders URL for the referring link.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.ConfirmSender(System.String)
member.summary: Parse the HTML of the source page.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.ContainHtml
member.summary: Checks whether or not the specified excerpt contains HTML.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.DoesPostExist(System.String)
member.summary: Check the specified postId and return a boolean value indicating whether or not the post exists in the data store.
member.param: The ID of the post that received a trackback request.
member.returns: True if the post exists, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.GetPostUrl(System.String)
member.summary:
Retrieve the URL of a post with the specified postId. This method is only used if the ExamineSendersUrl property is set to true.
The returned string will be used to confirm that the sender actually has a link to your post.
member.param: The ID of the post that received a trackback request.
member.returns: A valid URL or part of the URL that the senders page must contain.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.IsFirstTrackbackBySender
member.summary:
Checks to see if the sender has already send a trackback to the post. If it has, there is no reason to add it again.
Remember that the sender is allowed to send trackback request to different posts, but not more than one per post. Therefore, only examine the post with the PostId of the request.
member.returns: True if the sender hasn't had a trackback registered on the requested post; otherwise false

member.name: M:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.Finish(Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.TrackbackStatus)
member.summary:
This method is called as the last thing after the trackback request has been processed.
Use this method to redirect to the requested page or to change the response.
member.param: The status of the trackback request.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.SenderHasLink
member.summary: Gets whether or not the sender has a valid link to the blog post.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.ExcerptContainsHtml
member.summary: Gets if the excerpt contains HTML. It is considered to be spam if it does.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.IsSenderAlreadyRegistered
member.summary: Gets whether the sender already had a trackback registered on the post.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.ExamineSendersUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets whether or not to send a HTTP request to the sender's URL in order to examine it for a valid back link.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.Status
member.summary: Gets the status of the trackback request.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.PostId
member.summary: Gets the ID of the post from the request parameters.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.Title
member.summary: Gets the title of the senders post from the request parameters.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.Excerpt
member.summary: Gets the excerpt from the request parameters.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.BlogName
member.summary: Gets the name of the senders blog from the request parameters.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.Url
member.summary: Gets the URL of the senders post from the request parameters.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.IsReusable
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether another request can use the instance.
member.returns: true if the instance is reusable; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.TrackbackStatus
member.summary: A list of statuses that is associated with a trackback request.

member.name: F:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.TrackbackStatus.None
member.summary: I used when the request is valid but the post didn't exist in the data store.

member.name: F:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.TrackbackStatus.Valid
member.summary: Indicates that the trackback isn't spam and hasn't been registered on the requested post before.

member.name: F:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.TrackbackStatus.AlreadyRegistered
member.summary: Indicates that the trackback has already been registered on the requested post.

member.name: F:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.TrackbackStatus.Invalid
member.summary: Indicates that the HTTP request was invalid. It didn't send all the right parameters.

member.name: F:Subkismet.Trackback.TrackbackBase.TrackbackStatus.Spam
member.summary: Indicates that the trackback request comes from a spammer.

member.summary: Updates a black list and synchronizes its local data with the Google server.

member.summary: Verifies a list of links with local data and returns the number of the phishing or malware links.
member.param: A list of strings for the links.
The number of the phishing links (out).
The number of the malware links (out).

member.summary: Gets data from Google server for a black list.

member.summary: Gets the version of the list from the text value of the data.
member.returns: String value of the version.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Services.GoogleSafeBrowsing.Synchronizer.IsUpdate(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the current response from the server is an update to the local lists or a freshh new list.
member.returns: Boolean value that specifies if the response is an update or not.

member.summary: Fetches the list of keys from the Google server response.

member.returns: A list of Key objects for all keys included in the response.

member.summary: Gets the MD5 hash of the string value.

member.summary: Returns a list of final links to be checked with local black lists.

member.summary: Removes duplicate items from the list.

member.returns: A list of strings without duplicate items.

summary.para: Simple CAPTCHA control that requires the browser to perform a simple calculation via javascript to pass.
If javascript is not enabled, a form is rendered asking the user to add two random small numbers, unless the property is set to false.

member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.summary: Displays the control on the client.
member.param: A that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Captcha.InvisibleCaptcha.VisibleAnswerFieldName
member.summary: If Accessible is true and javascript disabled, this is the form field in which the answer would be entered by the user.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Captcha.InvisibleCaptcha.Accessible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this is accessible to non-javascript browsers. If false, then non-javascript browsers will always fail validation.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Captcha.InvisibleCaptcha.CaptchaInputClientId
member.summary: Id of the span used to house the visible captcha section.

member.name: T:Subkismet.Captcha.HoneypotCaptcha
member.summary: Simple Spam fighting validator. This renders a text box that should be left blank. Bots are likely to fill it out by accident.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Captcha.HoneypotCaptcha.Render(System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter)
member.summary: Displays the control on the client.
member.param: A that contains the output stream for rendering on the client.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Captcha.HoneypotCaptcha.EvaluateIsValid
member.summary: When overridden in a derived class, this method contains the code to determine whether the value in the input control is valid.
member.returns: true if the value in the input control is valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Captcha.HoneypotCaptcha.ControlPropertiesValid
member.summary: Checks the properties of the control for valid values.
member.returns: true if the control properties are valid; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Captcha.HoneypotCaptcha.ErrorCssClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the CSS class for the error message.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Captcha.HoneypotCaptcha.UseInlineStyleToHide
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether to use style="display: none;" to hide this honeypot captcha. If this is set to false, it is up to the developer to use CSS or some other means to hide it.
member.value: true if [use inline style to hide]; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:Subkismet.Captcha.HoneypotCaptcha.Text
member.summary: The text to display for non-css enabled browsers.

member.name: M:Subkismet.IAkismetClient.SubmitHam(Subkismet.IComment)
member.summary: Submits a comment to Akismet that should not have been flagged as SPAM (a false positive).

member.name: M:Subkismet.IAkismetClient.SubmitSpam(Subkismet.IComment)
member.summary: Submits a comment to Akismet that should have been flagged as SPAM, but was not flagged by Akismet.

member.name: T:Subkismet.HttpClient
member.summary: Class used to make the actual HTTP requests.
member.remarks: Yeah, I know you're thinking this is overkill, but it makes it easier to write tests to have this layer of abstraction from the underlying Http request.

member.name: T:Subkismet.Captcha.CaptchaControl
member.summary: Implements an image based Captcha validator control.
member.remarks:
In order for the Captcha control to work, you need to map the request for the captcha image renderer in web.config.
<configuration> ... <system.web> <httpHandlers> ... <add verb="*" path="*CaptchaImage.ashx" type="Subkismet.Captcha.CaptchaImageHandler, Subkismet"/> </httpHandlers> </system.web> </configuration>

member.name: T:Subkismet.Akismet`1
member.summary: Acts as a client to the Akismet service. Use this class to interface with the Akismet service from your web application. For fine grained control, you have the option to use the class directly.

remarks.para: The constructors require that you supply a delegate used to convert whatever representation of a comment you have in your system to one that is understood by this system.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Akismet`1.CreateSimpleAkismet(System.String,System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates a simple instance of Akismet for those who plan to simply use the type in their own code.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Akismet`1.#ctor(System.String,System.Uri,System.Converter{`0,Subkismet.Comment})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Akismet class.
member.param: The url of the site hosting and using the Akismet service.
A delegate used to convert a comment from the host site into one this library understands.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Akismet class.
member.param: The url of the site hosting and using the Akismet service.
A delegate used to convert a comment from the host site into one this library understands.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Akismet class.
member.param: A delegate used to convert a comment from the host site into one this library understands.
The proxy to use if any. Leave it null if no proxy is required.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Akismet`1.VerifyApiKey
member.summary: Verifies the api key.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Akismet`1.IsSpam(`0)
member.summary: Examines the item and determines whether or not it is spam.
member.exception: Thrown if the response from Akismet is not what we expected.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Akismet`1.SubmitGoodFeedback(`0)
member.summary: Submits the item to the service as a false positive. Something that should not have been marked as spam.

member.name: M:Subkismet.Akismet`1.SubmitSpam(`0)
member.summary: Submits the item to the service as a piece of SPAM that got through the filter. Something that should've been marked as SPAM.

member.summary: Main implementation for Google Safe Browsing.

member.summary: Verifies all links in a comment and returns the number of phishing or malware links.
member.param: The number of the phishing links (out).
The number of the malware links (out).
member.returns: A Boolean value that specifies if there was any bad link in the comment

member.summary: Checks a single link.

member.summary: Checks a list of links.
member.param: A list of string value for the links.
The number of the phishing links (out).
The number of the malware links (out).
member.returns: A Boolean value specifying if there was any bad link in the list.
